## VaultCreationError type

Describes why a Vault could not be created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type VaultCreationError = "missingLiquidationReserve";
```

## Remarks

See [VaultChange](./lib-base.vaultchange.md)<!-- -->.

<h2>Possible values</h2>

<table>

<tr> <th> Value </th> <th> Reason </th> </tr>

<tr> <td> "missingLiquidationReserve" </td> <td> A Vault's debt cannot be less than the liquidation reserve. </td> </tr>

</table>

More errors may be added in the future.
